titleStmt.title: Israels fast. Or, a meditation vpon the seuenth chapter of Ioshuah a faire precedent for these times. By H.B. rector of S. Mathews Fryday-Street.
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Cotes for Michael Sparke],
